PAD.synopsis: Players can find a few NPCs that have been raised by the myconoid to work as their servants. The party comments on this through a VB.This can fire on any character, and since it is not a result of direct player actions, the replies can be fairly opinionated.Can take one or two speakers.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: So those mushrooms can raise the dead? That's... interesting.
